returnPolicy.title: 30-Day Return Policy
returnPolicy.description: You have 30 days from the date of purchase to return items in their original condition with tags attached.

items.unworn: Items must be unworn, unwashed and in original packaging
items.tags: All tags and labels must be attached
items.saleable: Items must be in saleable condition

steps.contact: Contact our customer service team to initiate a return
steps.package: Package items securely with return form
steps.ship: Ship the package to our return address
steps.process: After receipt we will process your refund within 5-7 business days

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
refundProcess.description: Refunds will be processed to the original payment method. Please allow 5-7 business days for the refund to appear on your account.

needMoreInfo.title: Need More Information?
needMoreInfo.description1: For detailed delivery and return information, visit our
